panels.content:
# Attestation Processing Metrics

Metrics regarding `BeaconChain::process_attestation`, which processes `Attestation` from the network (but not in blocks).

Collected from the [`beacon_chain`](https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/master/beacon_node/beacon_chain) crate.

options.content:
# Attestation Processing Metrics

Metrics regarding `BeaconChain::process_attestation`, which processes `Attestation` from the network (but not in blocks).

Collected from the [`beacon_chain`](https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/master/beacon_node/beacon_chain) crate.

panels.content:
### Gossip Verification Times


Times to verify the attestation before re-gossiping

options.content:
### Gossip Verification Times


Times to verify the attestation before re-gossiping

panels.content:
### Storing Attestation

Times to store the attestation in fork choice or pools.

options.content:
### Storing Attestation

Times to store the attestation in fork choice or pools.

panels.content:
### Component Verification Times


Times to verify specific components of attestations

options.content:
### Component Verification Times


Times to verify specific components of attestations

panels.description: This is the time it takes to do just the BLS verification function (e.g., adding public keys, doing pairings, etc)
panels.title: Attestation Signature Verification Time

panels.content:
### Cache Hits/Misses


Rates of success/failure when trying the shuffling cache.

### Cache Hits/Misses


Rates of success/failure when trying the shuffling cache.

panels.content:
### Requests and Successes


Tracks the number of attestation processing requests and successes
